channel.title: Autohotkey on Coding notes - cheat sheets and snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Autohotkey on Coding notes - cheat sheets and snippets

item.title: Run LLM Locally with Ollama
item.description: Goal Run large language models locally on your machine using Ollama. Setup Install Ollama from https://ollama.com/download Run a Model ollama run llama2 Reference: https://klu.ai/glossary/ollama

item.title: Custom Keyboard Shortcuts with AutoHotKey
item.description: Goal: Remap keyboard combinations to different characters using AutoHotKey. Limitation: Maximum two keys combinations. Install AutoHotKey Download and install. Documentation. Map Alt+Z to < lessThan.ahk !z:: Send, < return Map Alt+X to > greaterThan.ahk !x:: Send, > return Activate Double click the .ahk files to run them. Run on Startup Create shortcuts to the .ahk files and copy them into the Windows startup folder.
